basic.blooming: Succulent plant, open yellow flower in spring
basic.color: Leaf color grey green to blue green and will turn red with much sunlight

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil surface is dry, reduce water in winter dormancy
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once monthly in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove flower stem, diseased and rotten leaves timely
